attributes.action: Give Monkey back his sickness bonus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Monkey, a proud employee, fell ill over his 21st birthday, the tyrants at his company decided he should therefore loose his sickness bonus which he had accrued over the last 2 1/2 years of loyal service to the firm. His boss, who has a head that shines like the moon, consistantly sings the song "wheres your bonus gone" to him.

This had left him heart broken and only a stones throw away from more time off with stress.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
